title: Krause Pitching - Burch Batting - More On Deck
author: frankbmd

posts.post_title: Krause Pitching - Burch Batting - More On Deck
posts.post_content:
Three cards still available.

John Frill      BVG 3      Sovereign 460

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10100/frill-sov-460[/IMG] 

Red Ames (Hands Over)         BVG 4        Polar Bear 

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10017/ames-hands-up[/IMG]

Frank Smith (Chi & Bos)BVG1Sweet Caporal 350-460  NC (Factory 42 Overstrike)

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-bvg/10206/smith-f-chi-bos[/IMG]

Harry Krause (Pitching)PSA3.5Piedmont 350 

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10265/krause-pitching[/IMG]

Al Burch (Batting)SGC30Piedmont 150 

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/10034/burch-batting[/IMG]

The asking prices for these cards include shipping in the US.  Shipping to Thailand and Canada will require a surcharge.  Payment in full to me by check, money order or PP F&F is requested.

Now for the good news

$OLD for Frill (Sov 460)
$OLD for Ames (Hands Over Head)
$OLD for Smith (Chicago and Boston)
$44 for Krause (Pitching)
$33 for Burch (Batting)

Now with Frill and Smith gone the straight flush has become the three card Monte.  Who is your queen - Ames, Krause or Burch?:D
These cards have some beautiful centering, Frank!

Three still available in this listing.

Looking at least for an offer I can refuse.  You never know.

More to come.

Payment sent thru Paypal. Thanks Frank.
James
